freemarker.core

类 CustomAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • freemarker.core.CustomAttribute

  • public class CustomAttribute
extends Object
    A class that allows one to associate custom data with a Configuration, a Template, or Environment.

    This API has similar approach to that of ThreadLocal (which allows one to associate custom data with a thread). With an example:

     // The object identity itself will serve as the attribute identifier; there's no attribute name String:
 public static final CustomAttribute MY_ATTR = new CustomAttribute(CustomAttribute.SCOPE_CONFIGURATION);
 ...
     // Set the attribute in this particular Configuration object:
     MY_ATTR.set(myAttrValue, cfg);
     ...
     // Read the attribute from this particular Configuration object:
     myAttrValue = MY_ATTR.get(cfg);

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int SCOPE_CONFIGURATION
      Constant used in the constructor specifying that this attribute is Configuration-scoped.
      static int SCOPE_ENVIRONMENT
      Constant used in the constructor specifying that this attribute is Environment-scoped.
      static int SCOPE_TEMPLATE
      Constant used in the constructor specifying that this attribute is Template-scoped.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明
      CustomAttribute(int scope)
      Creates a new custom attribute with the specified scope

      This method is invoked when get() is invoked without set(Object) being invoked before it to define the value in the current scope.

      Gets the value of a Configuration-scope attribute from the given Configuration.

      Same as set(Object, Environment), but uses Environment.getCurrentEnvironment() to fill the 2nd argument.

      Sets the value of a Template-scope attribute in the given Template.

      Same as set(Object, Template), but applicable to a TemplateConfiguration.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CustomAttribute

        public CustomAttribute(int scope)
        Creates a new custom attribute with the specified scope
        参数:
        scope - one of SCOPE_ constants.

    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        protected Object create()
        This method is invoked when get() is invoked without set(Object) being invoked before it to define the value in the current scope. Override it to create the attribute value on-demand.
        返回:
        the initial value for the custom attribute. By default returns null.

      • get

        public final Object get(Environment env)
        Gets the attribute from the appropriate scope that's accessible through the specified Environment. If the attribute has SCOPE_ENVIRONMENT scope, it will be get from the given Environment directly. If the attribute has SCOPE_TEMPLATE scope, it will be get from the parent of the given Environment (that is, in Configurable.getParent()) directly). If the attribute has SCOPE_CONFIGURATION scope, it will be get from Environment.getConfiguration().
        返回:
        The new value of the attribute (possibly null), or null if the attribute doesn't exist.
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - If env is null
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3.22

      • get

        public final Object get()
        Same as get(Environment), but uses Environment.getCurrentEnvironment() to fill the 2nd argument.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - If there is no current Environment, which is usually the case when the current thread isn't processing a template.

      • get

        public final Object get(Template template)
        Gets the value of a Template-scope attribute from the given Template.
        抛出:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If this custom attribute has different scope than SCOPE_TEMPLATE.
        NullPointerException - If template is null

      • get

        public Object get(TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration)
        Same as get(Template), but applies to a TemplateConfiguration.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3.24

      • get

        public final Object get(Configuration cfg)
        Gets the value of a Configuration-scope attribute from the given Configuration.
        抛出:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If this custom attribute has different scope than SCOPE_CONFIGURATION.
        NullPointerException - If cfg is null
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3.22

      • set

        public final void set(Object value,
                      Environment env)
        Sets the attribute inside the appropriate scope that's accessible through the specified Environment. If the attribute has SCOPE_ENVIRONMENT scope, it will be set in the given Environment directly. If the attribute has SCOPE_TEMPLATE scope, it will be set in the parent of the given Environment (that is, in Configurable.getParent()) directly). If the attribute has SCOPE_CONFIGURATION scope, it will be set in Environment.getConfiguration().
        参数:
        value - The new value of the attribute. Can be null.
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - If env is null
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3.22

      • set

        public final void set(Object value)
        Same as set(Object, Environment), but uses Environment.getCurrentEnvironment() to fill the 2nd argument.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - If there is no current Environment, which is usually the case when the current thread isn't processing a template.

      • set

        public final void set(Object value,
                      Template template)
        Sets the value of a Template-scope attribute in the given Template.
        参数:
        value - The new value of the attribute. Can be null.
        抛出:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If this custom attribute has different scope than SCOPE_TEMPLATE.
        NullPointerException - If template is null

      • set

        public final void set(Object value,
                      TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration)
        Same as set(Object, Template), but applicable to a TemplateConfiguration.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3.24

      • set

        public final void set(Object value,
                      Configuration cfg)
        Sets the value of a Configuration-scope attribute in the given Configuration.
        参数:
        value - The new value of the attribute. Can be null.
        抛出:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If this custom attribute has different scope than SCOPE_CONFIGURATION.
        NullPointerException - If cfg is null
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3.22
